text: Richard Blumenthal (born February 13, 1946) is the senior United States Senator from Connecticut. He has been in office since 2011. He served as Attorney General of Connecticut from 1991 to 2011. He is a member of the Democratic Party. ==References== ==Other websites== * Senator Richard Blumenthal official U.S. Senate site * Blumenthal for Senate * * Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Alumni of the University of Cambridge Category:People from Greenwich, Connecticut Category:Lawyers from Connecticut Category:Harvard University alumni Category:Jewish American politicians Category:Jewish lawyers Category:Politicians from New York City Category:United States senators from Connecticut Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Yale University alumni
title: Richard Blumenthal
